phrases: Where did he go?
Behind you, Butta!
What!?
Yo.
H- how did you get behind me!?
Behind me, who prides himself on being the fastest in the universe!
Then maybe you are second-fastest in the universe, are not you?
H - how can this be?
Not only did he repel my Crusher Ball, he managed to slip behind Butta!
lt's as if l'm having a bad dream.
Who are you!?
I am a Saiyan, who was raised on Earth... I guess.
Do not be ridiculous!
How can a Saiyan have that kind of speed!?
How should I know?
It must be from my having trained so hard.
Still, you cannot win on speed alone!
Not if all you are doing is running away!
Once you have worn yourself out running away, you will lose those sharp reflexes,
and then you will die!
Go ahead, dodge me!
C- can you see that?
Not at all.
Dammit!
How can members of the Ginyu Special Corps
let that runt make fools of them!?
It is all you can do to just evade me!
I could defeat you right now!
We will see about that.
What do you think you are doing!?
What about you?
Where were you looking!?
What!?
Why you...
Hold on.
This is no time to be fighting each other.
R- right.
Shall I show you then?
How there is more to me than just speed?
-What!?
-What!?
I hope you understand now.
Give up this senseless fight.
This guy, and the one before him, are both still alive.
Hurry up and take the two of them and get off this planet.
D- do not be a fool!
Kakarrot, finish them!
Finish them off!
These two are all beat up.
There is no need to kill them for no reason!
H- how can this be?
We are the Ginyu Special Corps, you know!
W- we are a super elite fighting force,
comprised of the five best warriors in all the universe!
How can we be beaten by such a low-level fighter!?
This is a nightmare!
I am going to be done in, and there is nothing I can do!
He is running away!
There is no helping some people, huh?
He just left his friends behind.
Sorry, guys, there are not any Senzu left.
Hey...
A- are you really Goku?
Yeah.
I have just been through some incredible training is all.
Vegeta!
How could you!?
I told you there was no need to finish them off!
Those guys could not even move.
It utterly sickens me with how lenient you always are!
Why did you let that other one get away?
With your strength now, you could have easily disposed of him!
It appears that you were unable to fully become a Super Saiyan after all.
Super Saiyan?
You seem to be proud with how overwhelmingly strong you have become,
but even so, there is no way you can beat Freeza.
Not unless you make yourself immortal or something.
You have no idea how terrible Freeza is!
I hate to sound like I am blowing my own horn,
but I think I have become a lot stronger.
Even so, you say that there is no way I can defeat this Freeza guy?
That is right.
If you plan on fighting him, then brace yourself.
Freeza's strength goes far beyond anything you can even imagine.
A- are you sure you are not exaggerating a little bit?
I mean, you saw Goku's strength just now, right?
Those guys were powerless against him!
Is there anyone who can beat Goku now?
In that case, go ahead and try fighting him.
What is even worse is that by now,
Freeza has probably become immortally young with the Dragon Balls.
Any way you cut it, there is no way to beat him now.
We can only pray that we do not run into him.
I do not think he is made his wish yet.
W- what?
How can you tell!?
If the Dragon Balls here are the same as the Dragon Balls on Earth,
then when Shen Long appears, the sky is supposed to get dark, right?
But up to now, the sky has remained bright.
I do not think it is happened yet.
S- Shen Long?
What is that?
W- when you get the Dragon Balls together, does something come out?
T- that is it!
I have got it!
He does not know what the password is!
He must think that just gathering all seven Dragon Balls together will grant him his wish.
A password?
You need that too?
There is still a chance for us to get our wish granted!
Oh, yeah!
Hey, Gohan!
We still might be able to bring our dead friends back to life!
Hooray!
Is not that great, Gohan?
Yeah!
Yay!
We are saved!
Goku, that means we have to get the Dragon Balls back, huh?
That is right.
S - Shen Long...
To think that these things can grant any wish...
After Freeza- sama gets the password from the Namekians,
he will be able to obtain eternal life...
Which means the whole universe will belong to Freeza.
What a wonderful thought.
What did you say!?
Ghurd, ReaCoom, and Butta were all killed!?
Yes, by some unbelievable kind of guy.
Do not be ridiculous!
We are the Ginyu Special Corps!
With the exception of Freeza- sama,
there is no one in the world stronger than the Ginyu Special Corps!
T- that is what I thought too, but the fact remains...
So, having those three battle ability ratings disappear
was not a Scouter malfunction, huh?
Should we contact Freeza- sama?
You must be joking!
How can we tell him such shameful news!?
It is a good thing Freeza- sama is not here.
I, Commander Ginyu, will give you an example
of how a real battle is to be waged.
I- if you please.
Hide the Dragon Balls!
If anything happens to them, you will suffer the wrath of Freeza- sama!
Yes, sir!
Hey you guys, this is not a game!
Hurry up!
Yes, sir!
There, no one will find them now.
All right then, we are off.
I am going to show them meticulously just how dreadful I can be.
Ginyu Special Corps, move out!
Sure enough, it does not have the same impact with only two of us.
And I just got done thinking up a new one, too...
I do not know who you are, but you are going to pay!
You are going to pay!
I have had it with Dad.
How can he say that Son- kun should have already landed on Namek?
Once Son- kun gets here, l should be the first one he comes and saves.
I have been looking after Son- kun ever since he was little.
It is no use.
These are all beyond repair.
I do not care anymore!
I wonder if Son- kun has landed yet.
It would be great if we could get the Dragon Balls back from them somehow.
Vegeta, you know them pretty well, right?
Is there any way to go about it?
Were not you planning to defeat Freeza?
I would like to if possible, but first, we have to bring everyone
who you killed on Earth back to life.
Come to think of it, Kaio- sama told me not to fight Freeza, no matter what.
Even if you get such a worthless wish granted, it will not do any good
if Freeza just comes along and wipes out all of Earth soon after, will it?
Instead, let me wish myself immortally young.
You have got to be kidding!
Letting you do that is no different from letting Freeza do so, is it!?
There are two battle powers headed this way!
So, he is gracing us with his presence?
You let Jheese get away, and now he is returning with Commander Ginyu.
This time, no matter how strong you may be,
you are going to have one tough opponent to handle.
Him, huh?
This one is going to be trouble all right, Goku.
Wait a minute, where is Freeza?
Now that he is got the Dragon Balls from Ginyu,
he should be at his spaceship.
Looks like he are not there any more.
I can feel a strong Ki way off in this direction.
That is probably Freeza.
B- but that direction is...
Oh no!
That is where Grand Elder- san is!
Grand Elder?
I get it!
Freeza was unable to get his wish granted,
so now he is headed off to ask a Namekian directly about it!
What?
You mean there is still some surviving Namekians?
That is probably the one who created the Dragon Balls here.
Yeah, that would be Grand Elder- san.
T- this is bad!
Once he finds out how to get his wish granted,
he is certain to kill Grand Elder- san and the others!
And if Grand Elder- san dies...
Once I pass away, the Dragon Balls will also disappear.
He does not know that if Grand Elder- san dies,
the Dragon Balls will be lost too!
W- what?
They are here!
You certainly made a mockery of us earlier, huh?
Now the Commander is here to personally make you suffer the consequences!
How about it, Goku?
Do you have a chance of winning this time, too?
I will not know until I try.
This guy sure appears to have an impressive level of strength, after all.
I see, so this is him, huh?
His battle power reads about 5000.
That is right, only 5000.
Strange, is not it?
You idiot!
You were made to look like fools because you only relied on the Scouter's rating.
No doubt he just raised his battle power dramatically for just a moment.
That is the type he is.
In my estimation, I would say he has an actual battle power of around 60,000.
But he is a Saiyan!
I have never heard of a Saiyan with a 60,000 rating.
It is not unheard of.
He was probably born an extremely gifted warrior,
some kind of mutant, just like we were.
This is shaping up to be a fight more interesting than any
I have experienced before.
I did not think the time would ever come when Ginyu- sama
would have to display his true power.
I will keep them busy.
You guys use the Dragon Radar to find the Dragon Balls.
They are probably still near their spaceship.
If I am able to defeat these guys, I will join you shortly.
Do not sound so discouraging!
Make sure you beat them!
Right.
Okay, let us go!
We have to hurry, before Grand Elder- san gets killed.
He may already have been...
At any rate, hurry!
Vegeta, you take care of the other one.
Now that you have recovered from being near death,
your power should be much greater.
He is no longer an unbeatable opponent, right?
You knew about that, huh?
Really?
All right, get going!
And be careful!
We are off!
Good luck, Goku!
They are getting away!
Let them go.
They are small fry.
Damn it, let there still be time!
Hang in there, Grand Elder- san.
All right, we are up, too.
Guess we have got no choice.
See you later, Kakarrot!
Vegeta!
Your guard is down!
Vegeta's ambitions are frightful.
And now, a direct battle between Goku and Ginyu begins.
